sentences.en: A short opening paragraph enables the reader to quickly grasp what the article is about.
sentences.cn: 开篇的小段落使读者很快就能掌握文章的大意。

sentences.en: Alan grasped the handle and pulled it.
sentences.cn: 艾伦抓住手柄一拉。

sentences.en: At that time, we did not fully grasp the significance of what had happened.
sentences.cn: 当时，我们没有完全明白所发生之事的重要性。

sentences.en: Attlee was extremely intelligent and his grasp of the situation was masterly.
sentences.cn: 阿特利聪明过人，对局势的把握颇为高明。

sentences.en: He had allowed the ball to slip from his grasp.
sentences.cn: 他让球从手里滑了出去。

sentences.en: He let the ball slip through his grasp and into the net.
sentences.cn: 球从他的掌中滑出，钻进了球门。

sentences.en: Her grasp of the issues was impressive.
sentences.cn: 她对这些问题的领悟能力极强。

sentences.en: His hand was taken in a warm, firm grasp.
sentences.cn: 他的手被热情地紧紧握住了。

sentences.en: I can't quite grasp the meaning of these figures.
sentences.cn: 我不能很好地领会这些数字的重要性.

sentences.en: I grasped his arm firmly and led him away.
sentences.cn: 我紧紧抓住他的胳膊把他带走。

sentences.en: I know that you'refloundering around, trying to grasp at any straw.
sentences.cn: 我知道你正不知所措，是在病急乱投医。

sentences.en: It's difficult to grasp the sheer enormity of the tragedy.
sentences.cn: 很难确切知道这场悲剧的严重程度.

sentences.en: Luke took her arm in a firm grasp and led her through the gate.
sentences.cn: 卢克紧紧抓着她的胳膊，领她进了门。

sentences.en: Peace is now within our grasp.
sentences.cn: 现在和平在望。

sentences.en: She allowed victory to slip from her grasp.
sentences.cn: 她让胜利从手中溜走了。

sentences.en: Some people find the idea of relativity difficult to grasp.
sentences.cn: 有些人觉得相对论的概念很难理解。

sentences.en: The bag was wrenched from her grasp.
sentences.cn: 那只包从她紧握的手里被夺了出来。

sentences.en: The hammer slipped out of her grasp.
sentences.cn: 锤子从她的手中滑落。

sentences.en: The immensity of the universe is difficult to grasp.
sentences.cn: 宇宙的浩瀚难以捉摸。

sentences.en: The officer managed to wrest the gun from his grasp.
sentences.cn: 警官最终把枪从他手中夺走了.

sentences.en: The people in your grasp are not guests, they are hostages.
sentences.cn: 你所控制的这些人不是客人，而是人质。

sentences.en: The students had a grasp of decimals, percentages and fractions.
sentences.cn: 学生们掌握了小数、百分数和分数。

sentences.en: They have a good grasp of foreign languages.
sentences.cn: 他们外语掌握得很好。

words.tran_cn: 理解，领会（grasp的现在分词形式）；抓紧，抓牢

trans.tran_cn: 紧抓，掌握，理解，力所能及
trans.tran_en: the way you hold something or your ability to hold it
to take and hold something firmly
to take and hold something firmly

trans.tran_cn: 抓住； 掌握， 理解， 领会
trans.tran_en: to take and hold something firmly
